mapper.select: select count(ORDER_NO) count from order_list natural join order_item where mem_id=#{mem_id}
select count(*) from order_item natural join (select order_no from order_list where mem_id=#{mem_id} and ORDER_STATUS='배송중')

select * from(select rownum rr, a.* from(select ORDER_NO,ITEM_NO,ITEM_NAME, ITEM_FIRST_PRICE, ITEM_DISCOUNT, ITEM_THUMBNAIL, TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'DAY')||' '||TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'MONDD')||'일' ORDER_DATE, ORDERS_ITEM_CNT,MEM_ID,ORDER_STATUS,ORDER_REQUEST,ORDER_TO_NAME,ORDER_TRACKING_NUM, ORDER_TO_ADDRESS,ORDER_ADDRESS_DETAIL from item natural join (select ORDER_NO,ITEM_NO,ORDERS_ITEM_CNT,ORDERS_ITEM_MONEY,MEM_ID,ORDER_DATE,ORDER_STATUS,ORDER_REQUEST, ORDER_TO_NAME,ORDER_TRACKING_NUM,ORDER_TO_ADDRESS,ORDER_ADDRESS_DETAIL from order_item NATURAL join (select ORDER_NO,ORDER_DATE,ORDER_STATUS,ORDER_TRACKING_NUM, ORDER_TO_NAME,ORDER_TO_ADDRESS,ORDER_ADDRESS_DETAIL, ORDER_REQUEST,MEM_ID from order_list order by ORDER_DATE)) where mem_id =#{mdto.mem_id})a) b where rr BETWEEN #{start} and #{end} order by ORDER_DATE

select ORDER_NO,ITEM_NO,ITEM_NAME, ITEM_FIRST_PRICE,ITEM_DISCOUNT,ITEM_THUMBNAIL,TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'DAY')||' '||TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE,'MONDD')||'일' ORDER_DATE, ORDERS_ITEM_CNT,MEM_ID,ORDER_STATUS,ORDER_REQUEST,ORDER_TO_NAME,ORDER_TRACKING_NUM,ORDER_TO_ADDRESS,ORDER_ADDRESS_DETAIL from item natural join (select ORDER_NO,ITEM_NO,ORDERS_ITEM_CNT,ORDERS_ITEM_MONEY,MEM_ID,ORDER_DATE,ORDER_STATUS,ORDER_REQUEST, ORDER_TO_NAME,ORDER_TRACKING_NUM,ORDER_TO_ADDRESS,ORDER_ADDRESS_DETAIL from order_item NATURAL join (select ORDER_NO,ORDER_DATE,ORDER_STATUS,ORDER_TRACKING_NUM, ORDER_TO_NAME,ORDER_TO_ADDRESS,ORDER_ADDRESS_DETAIL, ORDER_REQUEST,MEM_ID from order_list )) where mem_id = #{mem_id} and order_no=#{order_no} and item_no=#{item_no} order by order_no desc
